summary: The Department of Veterans Affairs serves over 9 million veterans at 171 VA medical centers and 1,112 outpatient sites. It faces challenges modernizing its facilities and keeping up with a growing maintenance backlog. We testified about VA's efforts to manage its vast portfolio of assets. title: VA Real Property: Preliminary Observations on Challenges Limiting VA's Ability to Effectively Manage Its Assets
